key_risks: High capital expenditures and cash flow concerns
Dependence on cutting-edge technology and risk of obsolescence
Economic sensitivity to discretionary spending downturns
Intense competition from traditional and digital entertainment providers
controversies: Unfair labor practice cases filed with the National Labor Relations Board
Opposition to expansion plans due to environmental and heritage concerns
environmental_issues: Environmental impact of large-scale venue construction and operation
Scrutiny over sustainability claims despite solar energy commitments
social_issues: Labor controversies and potential reputational harm
Weak ESG risk management as rated by Sustainalytics
governance_issues: Weak management of ESG material risks
Regulatory challenges and potential project delays
